description:
David begins to have fragmented memories of his past , a life of crime and murder , before he moved to the U.S. when an accident took his memory and his vision. Under the tutelage of Don Michele , he was the favorite of violent Cortello family, the Sicilian Mafia ... A family that he ended up betraying . Now on the run , trying to escape the arm of Cortello in New York City , controlled by the explosive and irrational Don Federico - who is the brother of David , without either of them knowing. Persecuted , David goes in search of her Italian origins . Within a train, he meets a mysterious woman and also Father Leonard, who feel they have a connection , something related to David that weighs on the conscience of the religious , who has a previous life also filled with crime and death. When everyone returns to Sicily , it is time to clean the brothers take their differences , on behalf of the mafia and rid yourself of your mortal sins !
